verses.name: Ezekiel 28:1
verses.text: The word of the Lord came again unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:2
verses.text: Son of man, say unto the prince of Tyrus, Thus saith the Lord God; Because thine heart is lifted up, and thou hast said, I am a God, I sit in the seat of God, in the midst of the seas; yet thou art a man, and not God, though thou set thine heart as the heart of God:

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:3
verses.text: Behold, thou art wiser than Daniel; there is no secret that they can hide from thee:
